explanation: [0-0] In a room with tiled flooring, four boys lie side by side on their stomachs, covered with a yellow and brown blanket, their eyes glued to a tablet installed on the door. A man in black sits on a stool by the doorway, a booklet in hand, also watching the content on the tablet. The room is simple, with only a white door as the focal point and a wooden cabinet beside it.

[0-10] They are engrossed in the content on the tablet when suddenly the door opens and a woman in green walks in. The four boys lying on the floor immediately pretend to be asleep. The man fans himself back and forth with the booklet in his hand. The woman, holding a thin stick, bends down to help the boys tuck in their blanket, then exits the room and closes the door.
